positioning.title: Evolved CRM Systems. High Complexity. Clear Solutions.
positioning.text: Challenges in CRM systems are rarely purely technical. Often, what's missing is clean solution architecture, clear responsibilities, or resilient integration concepts. I help organizations structure Salesforce landscapes, make decision options visible, and establish systems that are sustainable long-term.

ai.title: AI, GPT & Data Science — applied with purpose
ai.text: We build AI solutions that deliver real value: technically sound, thoughtfully integrated and aligned with your organization.

cards.title: AI & GPT Strategy
cards.subtitle: From questions to an executable roadmap
cards.description: We assess your data landscape, processes and technical prerequisites, prioritize meaningful AI use cases and define a realistic implementation strategy.

cards.title: Salesforce AI
cards.subtitle: Einstein, Data Cloud & automation
cards.description: We integrate Salesforce AI capabilities directly into your CRM processes — from predictive insights and data unification to intelligent automation.

cards.title: Data Science
